comments:
After updating from 0.1.2 to 0.1.3 I get this error trying to edit any files:

Unable to create this part due to an internal error. Reason for the failure: Editor could not be initialized.

Reverting to 0.1.2 makes this go away.  PHP Project Outline still seems to work, PHP Explorer doesn't show up.

Incorrect version of WST.
You must upgrade your Eclipse to 3.2x and WST to 1.5x.

When upgrading via update site, you should be informed about that (this will be fixed in 0.1.5).
